summary: This bill directs the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff to conduct a feasibility study on incorporating militarily-relevant applications of emerging biotechnology into wargaming exercises. The study will assess the feasibility and advisability of modifying wargaming exercises to include biotechnology-enabled enhancements for warfighters, strategic materials, and adversaries' use of biotechnology. The Chairman must consult with various stakeholders and submit a report to the Armed Services Committees within 180 days, detailing recommended modifications and a plan for updates.
